## Description {#details}

We can&#39;t (at least, at this moment with C++14) declare <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo</a> as a friend of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointerunion">PointerUnion</a> like this:

<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> To&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">CastInfo&lt;To, PointerUnion&lt;PTs...&gt;&gt;;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
 The compiler complains &#39;Partial specialization cannot be declared as a friend&#39;. So we define this struct to be a bridge between <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointerunion">PointerUnion</a>.

Definition at line 232 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/pointerunion-h">PointerUnion.h</a>.
